examples: 'S' example: Arecaceae Trachycarpus dracocephalus Ching & Y.T.Hsu IN Acta Phytotax. Sin. 3: 367 (1955). 'P' example: Adiantum annamense Ching in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 6: 315. (1957).
source: From R. Davies 13 Oct. 1989; Pichi Sermolli's list, 3 March 1991. Biography, incl. portr.,  opposite title page of reprint of Icones Filicum Sin. (2011).
